channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: U.S. Crude Oil Stockpiles Increase in Latest Week
item.description: U.S. crude oil inventories rose for the first time in four weeks, and gasoline and distillate stocks increased amid lower demand, according to EIA dat...

item.title: US House Republicans cancel vote on stopgap funding measure
How a Private-Equity Payday Drained a Hospital Chain of Cash
item.description: Steward Health Care recently went bust, years after paying a $790 million dividend to its shareholders.

item.title: Boba Network Welcomes Lynx, Enhancing Cross-Chain Perpetuals Trading

item.description: Next yearâ€™s cost-of-living adjustment is expected to be 2.5% as inflation cools.

item.title: US stocks mixed after core inflation picks up pace to cool bets on larger Fed cut
Topgolf Sent Callaway Into the Rough
item.description: The recreational driving-range business has been a drag for the top golf-equipment maker.

item.title: Buyout firm EQT explores $2 billion sale of Banking Circle, sources say
A Recession Signal Is Flashing Red. Or Is It?
item.description: When the yield curve turns positive, the country is usually about to plunge into recession. Hope this time relies on a few historical exceptions.

item.title: Commerzbank would boost UniCredit earnings, but not without risks
